Sarah: ✅ NFR-004 deleted and re-added successfully. I've cleaned up the erroneous sprint tracking fields (e.g., removed sprint assignment, velocity estimates, and status trackers) to keep it focused on the core requirements: role-based access control post-authentication. The story is now back in the backlog as a high-priority item, ready for future sprints. Anything else to adjust?
